entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
